replies.author: ColorsWind
replies.txt_content:
如果你希望玩家在床上睡觉可以跳跃夜晚的话
考虑https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/smoothsleep.32043/

replies.author: 九
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Remote_Prep
replies.txt_content: 你要全部人都躺床上才行啊

replies.author: Remote_Prep
replies.txt_content: 我记得装个地毯端可以解决

replies.author: Stant_hed
replies.txt_content: 命令方块或者定时任务插件一直执行/time set day 即可
